mapper.insert: insert into dicts (dict_id,dict_wbs_code,dict_type_name,dict_value,remark) values(#{dictId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dictWbsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dictTypeName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dictValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update dicts set dict_id=#{dictId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},dict_wbs_code=#{dictWbsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},dict_type_name=#{dictTypeName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},dict_value=#{dictValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR},remark=#{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dict_id=#{dictId}
